Tests that navigation instrumentation doesn't fail with a long async stack chain.
URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/network/resources/simple-iframe.html?
Initiator: 
{
    stack : {
        callFrames : [
            [0] : {
                columnNumber : 20
                functionName : f
                lineNumber : 4
                scriptId : <string>
                url : 
            }
        ]
        parent : {
            callFrames : [
                [0] : {
                    columnNumber : 33
                    functionName : eval
                    lineNumber : 0
                    scriptId : <string>
                    url : 
                }
            ]
            description : Promise.then
        }
    }
    type : script
}
